definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Many people com tributed for the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 许多人向水灾灾民捐款。

sentences.english: Private Chinese donations have already raised more than $A520 million.
sentences.chinese: 中国的私人捐款已提出了多美元的a520万美元。

sentences.english: Some clubs are always dunning their members for contribution.
sentences.chinese: 某些俱乐部老是向其成员催缴捐款。

sentences.english: Donations of $10 can be made by texting "MFR" to 85944.
sentences.chinese: 发送MFR到85944就可以捐款10美元。

sentences.english: Thanks to Mr. Li Jing's donation, we will provide free pizza for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 多谢李竞先生的捐款，中午将提供免费比萨。

sentences.english: Donation of HK$100 or above is tax-deductible.
sentences.chinese: 捐款港币一百元或以上可获免税。

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank account. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接将捐款进入禅院户口，并通知禅院负责人。

sentences.english: Real charity doesn't care if it's tax-deductible or not.
sentences.chinese: 真正的慈善捐款不在乎是否可以扣税。

sentences.english: Kenai officials set up a nonprofit organization to collect donations from residents.
sentences.chinese: 基奈的官员设立了一个非营利组织接受居民的捐款。

sentences.english: Do you want to donate to your church or a favorite cause?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意为当地的教堂捐款或花钱学一门你最爱的课程？

sentences.english: No benefactions can make up for the change in character the city has suffered.
sentences.chinese: 捐款决不能弥补城市所经受的性质上的变化。

sentences.english: He enlisted help from 10 Web-savvy volunteers and began soliciting donations on his blog.
sentences.chinese: 他在网上招募志愿者，并在博客中呼吁捐款捐物。

sentences.english: Fifty percent of the tuition at private universities is covered by the school s endowment 。
sentences.chinese: 私立大学百分之五十的学费来自于学校获得的捐款。

sentences.english: The hamsters will love their new donation report.
sentences.chinese: 鼠类将会喜欢它们的新捐款报告。

sentences.english: Users can donate here or by clicking on the notice on top of each page on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以在此捐款或者点击维基百科页面顶端的通告。

sentences.english: Name of the donor will be written on the tree according to the donation amount.
sentences.chinese: 捐款人名字将按捐款额刻于树上不同地方。

definition: to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
